heroe.introDescription: Your full-stack developer and Laravel expert. I spend my nights (and often my days) creating innovative web solutions with <RouterLink to='/projects' class='text-blue-500'>Laravel, Vue.js</RouterLink>, and <RouterLink to='/technologie' class='text-blue-500'>Tailwind CSS</RouterLink>, transforming ideas into intuitive, functional and aesthetic digital experiences. Passionate about code logic, my motivation comes from the complexity of each <RouterLink to='#works' class='text-blue-500 hover:underline hover:underline-offset-2'>project</RouterLink>. With a strong taste for code aesthetics, I strive to create fluid and efficient code. I invite you to check out my <RouterLink to='/blog' class='text-blue-500 hover:underline hover:underline-offset-2'>blog</RouterLink> to learn more about my skills and experiences.

footer.description: I am a passionate web developer who loves to create unique digital experiences. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate web developer who loves to create unique digital experiences. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
about.longDescription: I am Chrislain Avocegan, also known as Zylo. A passionate full-stack web developer, I combine technical expertise and creativity to design modern, efficient and intuitive web solutions. Specialized in Laravel, Vue.js, PHP, Tailwind CSS and WordPress, I have collaborated on various projects, ranging from showcase websites to high-performance web applications for businesses and individuals. My journey has allowed me to master the entire development process, from initial design to final deployment, while ensuring an optimal user experience. What sets me apart: Technical skills: An in-depth knowledge of back-end and front-end technologies, combined with a sensitivity for UX/UI design. Successful projects: I have worked on projects such as NH High School, a school management application, or Glory's Nails, an elegant website for a women's beauty salon. Continuous learning: Passionate about innovation, I spend time learning new technologies and techniques to constantly improve my skills. My approach: My goal is to solve complex problems with simple, elegant and functional solutions, whether for a startup seeking visibility or an established company looking to optimize its performance. Through these processes, I strive to offer personalized services tailored to each need. When I'm not coding, I enjoy activities like rollerblading, reading inspiring manga or creating graphic designs.
